tag_list: technology-blogger, business-writer, content, blog, writing, business, voip, it
overview:
Tahir Akbar is a young technology blogger and a business writer. He is working as a content and social media manager with a leading US based voice over IP Company and also runs a small outsourcing business. By qualification, he is a university graduate with honors in Applied Management and also has a bachelors’ degree in journalism. Some professional and IT diplomas helped him make his smooth entry into information technology industry.

His company; EbizzWorld, deals in professional research and custom writing services. He is contributor to many leading online resources of technology and business. He also writes his own blog; “Diary of a Chief Executive” and enjoys platinum expert author status at EzineArticles.com.
